Ãƒâ€º             Useful File Utilities (UFU) is a very fast and                   Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             easy-to-use file browser. It has some internal                   Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             utilities such as Renamer, Replacer and Finder.                  Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             Moreover, it has external utilities such as Change               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             Attributes and Batch Replacer. UFU has utilities                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             necessary for webmasters, programmers and anybody                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             who is concerned with computers. Imagine that you                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             need to process hundreds of files. It would take you             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             many hours to do this manually. Fortunately, UFU is              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             created to solve this problem as it does this job,               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             and more, for you easily. You can even process files             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             from several directories or even disks                           Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             simultaneously (see Basket drive in the help menu of             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             the program).                                                    Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º                                                                              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             Download.com Review of Useful File Utilities:                    Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             A simple file manager for advanced users, Useful                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             File Utilities picks up where the standard Windows               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             Explorer leaves off. Its two-panel interface calls               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             to mind the popular Norton Commander, but here you               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             have the Basket, a clipboard for files. The suite's              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             main tools, Finder, Replacer, and Renamer, help you              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             make quick work of file searching, text replacement,             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             and bulk renaming across a range of file formats and             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             attributes. Useful File Utilities even can change                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             attributes, such as Hidden or Date of Creation for               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             several files at once. This utility will appeal to               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             file wranglers who have found the functionality of               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             Windows Explorer insufficient for their needs.                   Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º                                                                              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             Internal utilities:                                              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Replacer - find and replace text or add text to                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               file.                                                          Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Renamer - rename files by mask string. You can see             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               new names before start rename.                                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Finder - find files in your disks. You can find                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               duplicates files.                                              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º                                                                              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             External utilities (plug-ins):                                   Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Change Attributes - change attributes on files and             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               directories. Also you be able to change ANY of the             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               various dates (created, modified, accessed).                   Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Batch Replacer - is a multi-string                             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               search-and-replace filter. It can Find strings in              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               files and replace their to anything. It supports               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               wildcards and repeated sequence of symbols. You                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               can find more than two spaces or CRLF and replace              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               their to one space or CRLF. Both text and binary               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               files can be processed by the program.                         Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * OemAnsi converter - This plug-in can make                   Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               conversion of text file from OEM (Dos) to ANSI                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               (Windows) coding or vice versa.                                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Make List Files - This plug-in allow you to save               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               names of selected files in list file. After that               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               you able to print this list. If you often use                  Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               "Finder" utility this plug-in needed for you.                  Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Case Converter - This plug-in allow you to convert             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               any words and even file names within content of                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               files to lower or UPPER case. If you want to                   Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               convert all file names to lower or UPPER case you              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               no need to enter each name. You need enter only                Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               extension. It very useful if you need to to move               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               all of our hosted domains from a Windows NT                    Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               platform to Linux. This is actual because Linux is             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               case-sensitive, both for file names and file                   Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               content.                                                       Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º             * Replace and Rename - This utility allow you to                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               perform both file renaming AND text replacing in               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               one easy batch file from one "keyword" import                  Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               file. Moreover Replace and Rename works with files             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               from directories and subdirectories. All that you              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               need is to select directory (or directories) with              Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               files which you want to process. But processing of             Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               single selected files are available too. Utility               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               will make replacement in the files which extension             Ãƒâ€º

Ãƒâ€º               extension" field. And it will rename files which               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               have extensions specified in the "Rename files                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               which have extension" field. Also utility have the             Ãƒâ€º

Ãƒâ€º               performing two operations. Field "Do not perform               Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               replacing in files" or "Do not rename files" must              Ãƒâ€º

Ãƒâ€º               "Load from file" allow to load the a text file                 Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€º               which have values delimited by the tab character.              Ãƒâ€º
